overview:
@ No. 1 in SEO Expert | @ No. 1 in Social Networking Expert | @ No. 1 Social Media Marketing | @No. 1 Internet Marketing | IN LinkedIn in India

As a SEO Expert, SEO Guest Speaker, and a Internet Marketing Speaker, I enjoy working with Indian and Overseas Clients.

As an Internet Marketing Expert, and SEO Expert, I often am asked, “What is Internet Marketing Strategy?” I tell them, I have a long answer that takes, 24 hours in my working time, or I have the short answer which I will share with you now.

Internet Marketing Strategy is a process of using all 6 areas which include content, delivery, retention, SEO, Social Network Marketing, and Social Media Marketing, Paid Ads, to create an internet presence which will be found, and engage potential internet based clients to buy your products or services.

As an “Search Engine Optimization” Expert, I find it funny that Linked ranks me as an SEO Expert, which if you check the stats, are the same SEO math as Google 3 years ago, so when you look for SEO Expert in LinkedIn, please keep in mind that this is a great example of how a search engine works, and how it figures out a search term like “Search Engine Optimization” Expert.

When selecting a SEO Expert, you should look at Google to look for things like SEO Services, in the city, like SEO Services India. Which will show you how the SEO Expert, is capable of his skills as an SEO Expert. You can check out my own blog http://newtechportal.blogspot.com/ You can search me directly on Google just typing my name like “Arun Lal Sharma”. You will found me in all 10 results.

Specialties Online Branding, SEO Expert, Internet Marketing Expert, Social Media Expert, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Optimization, Social Networking Expert, Search Engine Optimzation Expert, SEO Marketing, Traffic Emulator Expert, Competitive Analysis Expert, Content Copy writing, CSS & HTML Code Expert, Link Optimization Expert, Google Analytics Expert, Google Webmaster Tool, Bing, Yahoo, Webmasters, E-Mail Marketing, Viral Marketing, Campaign Tracking, Video Marketing, PPT Expert, Forums etc.
